Name: Make Me LAG
About the game: You believe that running a game at over 120 FPS is smart? Well, you're WRONG! Make Me LAG is the first game that features a revolutionary new control scheme: your character actions are determined by the game frame count! Use external softwares and other tricks to lower the FPS count and control your character to defeat evil monsters and save the world! Open too many tabs on your browsers, play other games simultaneously, hack the internet, we don't care what you do, as long as you make the game lag! Make Me LAG was created during the Internet Festival Game Jam of Pisa in 48 hours and won the first prize.
